title: goldcloud
author: goldcloud
content: I make animated and non-animated telegram stickers/Giffs related to your token or something.Preview of some of my workshttps://t.me/addstickers/SpaceDawgsCoinhttps://t.me/addstickers/SpaceDawgsStickershttps://t.me/addstickers/SpaceDawgsAnimatedStickershttps://t.me/addstickers/SpaceDawgsNewStickersGiffs: https://giphy.com/channel/tokenservicePrice: Each non animated stickers: 10$          Each Animated Stickers and Giffs 15$Instant Contact: https://t.me/mindcoderIf you need video introductions or promotions visit my other service: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5344928.0

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: goldcloud on September 15, 2023, 10:27:09 PMIf you need video introductions or promotions visit my other service: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5344928.0I was reading comments on the other topic, The way some newbie accounts were vouching for you, it clearly shows you hired these people or worse case, you created those alternative accounts and vouching for yourself. This is a shady practice to conduct a business. I don't think anyone from this forum will buy your service after seeing such obvious fake marketing.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Why creating a new thread when you already have an announcement thread for your services. Irrespective of the year it was created and how old the thread could be,you could have updated it with this new service of yours or better still you bump it up rather than creating multiple announcement thread for same purpose you could be tagged a scammer or spammer for doing this and nobody would look your services already I noticed from the old announcement thread you made available some newbie account vouching for your services which I think is a no no sign here. That alone shows how desperate you are and could scare away prospective clients from patronising your services.Lastly, your stickers are way too much expensive than one could imagine. Do you not use escrow services for your business? As I think that is the only means I believe members here would want to deal for their own safety. Maybe you should have a look into it and put it into consideration.

comments.author: goldcloud
comments.created_time: September 17, 2023, 11:26:41 AMLast edit: September 17, 2023, 11:51:56 AM by goldcloud
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on September 16, 2023, 11:55:00 AMQuote from: goldcloud on September 15, 2023, 10:27:09 PMIf you need video introductions or promotions visit my other service: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5344928.0I was reading comments on the other topic, The way some newbie accounts were vouching for you, it clearly shows you hired these people or worse case, you created those alternative accounts and vouching for yourself. This is a shady practice to conduct a business. I don't think anyone from this forum will buy your service after seeing such obvious fake marketing.Those comments from real peeople, if you dont want to belive it, you can see it as you want  moderators should check it tell us are they real or not, after the result i would like to hear your comments about it :d  they are old profiles, i already closed that thread business btw, i only sell some of my services from btctalk i have lots of clients on my telegram who are buying my services regularly and they are happy. You have thousands of comments on this site, i think your all life is here and looking for threads to comments anything, live your life bro, life is very good, negativity wont help you, you need self love, you will do it i believe thanks for the comment, have a great day.

comments.author: goldcloud
comments.created_time: September 17, 2023, 11:33:15 AMLast edit: September 17, 2023, 11:50:50 AM by goldcloud
comments.body: Quote from: CryptSafe on September 16, 2023, 02:58:51 PMWhy creating a new thread when you already have an announcement thread for your services. Irrespective of the year it was created and how old the thread could be,you could have updated it with this new service of yours or better still you bump it up rather than creating multiple announcement thread for same purpose you could be tagged a scammer or spammer for doing this and nobody would look your services already I noticed from the old announcement thread you made available some newbie account vouching for your services which I think is a no no sign here. That alone shows how desperate you are and could scare away prospective clients from patronising your services.Lastly, your stickers are way too much expensive than one could imagine. Do you not use escrow services for your business? As I think that is the only means I believe members here would want to deal for their own safety. Maybe you should have a look into it and put it into consideration.slandering is easy but reality is not as you see, i use escrow also from lots of website, how did you think that i dont use escrow? in here i completed lots of works and all clients were happy with my works, so nothing to think for me for this simple lovely commentand for the other thread, you are right but i will delete that thread because service announcements are not active as here, and its not an announcement anymore.ife is good stop negativity bro  love yourself, you will understand you dont need to attack those threads to satisfy your ego.

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: goldcloud on September 17, 2023, 11:26:41 AMThose comments from real peeople, if you dont want to belive it, you can see it as you want  Don't get the idea that I did not see it. Of course they are real people but difference is their posts are not organic. One of the following that happened.[1.] You hired someone from cheap Fiverr platform and they promised you to bump your thread. [2.] You bought these accounts from a or many account sellers and posting from the accounts[3.] You farmed the account yourself to use it for vouching for any service you had in plan. AliArbi, oflibaba, Koinnokami are some of the accounts.

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: goldcloud on September 17, 2023, 03:36:41 PMModerators should check it, and they will see it don't worry, thanks.I am not worried and you are not the first time too. What do you think I can miss since 2015?FYI, moderators are not going to do anything, unless anyone reports it.Anyway, i don't want to be the bad guy here. I am trying to say what works and what does not in the forum. If your works are good then have proper marketing plan and execute it instead of spamming the forum with those paid shills. You will do better.
